channel.title: Can anyone Help with this?
channel.description:
Nvm Thank you I found out for anyone else who has this issuse anywhere undefined in your Client.java insert this statement
public boolean PutNPCCoords = false; ^ this code might be off check chapter four
go to this site chapter four for more on booleans or server editing http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-317-creating-server-coding-265036/
Heres the error: client.java:10385: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCoords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ 1 errors

@ChuckCrapp wrote:

Nvm Thank you I found out for anyone else who has this issuse anywhere undefined in your Client.java insert this statement

public boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
^ this code might be off check chapter four

go to this site chapter four for more on booleans or server editing

RaGEZONE - MMO development community

[Tut] [317] Creating a Server and Coding - RaGEZONE - MMO development community

NOTE: The forum where all the old posts were was having issues so i couldn't dig up the server tutorial amongst the 1000+ pages. This guide is from the moparscape forums compli

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone Help with this?
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

It looks like you just didn’t type out the boolean correctly. Try changing the beginning letter of (PutNPCCoords = true;) to a lowercase p.

putNPCCoords = true;

EDIT: Otherwise, you haven’t declared PutNPCCoords yet.

boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

Read full topic
